info.title: FedEO Earth Observation Catalog
info.description:
Merged Earth Observation Metadata
FedEO provides interoperable access, following ISO/OGC interface guidelines, to Earth Observation metadata.
You can try all HTTP operations described in this OpenAPI 3.0 specification.

get.description: The endpoint returns information about the *FedEO* dataset matching specific filtering criteria such as organisation, platform, instrument, title, keyword and lists the datasets .

parameters.name: parentIdentifier
parameters.description: The id of the dataset series to retrieve dataset

parameters.name: httpAccept
parameters.description: Query parameter to define expected reponse type.

parameters.name: startPage
parameters.description: Start index of first result page {os:startPage}.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of center of area of interest {geo:lat}.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude of center of area of interest {geo:lon}.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of area of interest {geo:radius} in meters.  Is combined with {geo:lon} and {geo:lat} or {geo:name}.

parameters.name: geometry
parameters.description: Area of interest in WKT format {geo:geometry}.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Local identifier {geo:uid} of the dataset series returned as \<dc:identifier\> in response.

post.description: Insert a new dataset to the catalogue.

requestBody.description: Insert a new dataset to the catalogue.

get.description: Search a dataset from the catalogue.

parameters.name: httpAccept
parameters.description: Query parameter to define expected reponse type.

put.description: Insert a new dataset to the catalogue.

requestBody.description: Insert a new dataset to the catalogue.

delete.description: Delete a dataset from the catalogue.

requestBody.description: create quality indicators of a dataset.

400.description: Bad request. Indicator is already exsisted.

requestBody.description: update quality indicators of a dataset.

400.description: Bad request. Indicator not yet exsisted.

requestBody.description: create quality metrics of a dataset.

400.description: Bad request. Metrics is already exsisted.

requestBody.description: update a metric of a dataset.

400.description: Bad request. Metric not yet exsisted.

delete.description: Delete a metric of a dataset.

items.description: Linear ring, i.e. linestring or array of positions
Linear ring, i.e. linestring or array of positions

Queries.description: Object with queries grouped by "role".  See also http://www.opensearch.org/Specifications/OpenSearch/1.1#OpenSearch_Query_element

Query.description: OpenSearch Query element as defined at http://www.opensearch.org/Specifications/OpenSearch/1.1#OpenSearch_Query_element.

Links.title: Links
Links.description: Objects with Links grouped by "relation" (i.e. Atom "rel" attribute).

category.description: Media category property defined by MediaRSS.

expression.description: Media expression property defined by MediaRSS.
